post:
As some of you know, I began my LowendSpirit journey by running a shared hosting server in Phoenix. 
From that it escalated to 10 different NAT VPS locations, soon to be 11 and 12. 

I have not forgotten about the shared hosting offers, I got a reseller package in Amsterdam which now is to small for my needs.

To kick things off on the newly installed Amsterdam server, I am offering 50% on **all packages** when paid annually, use promo code:  " 2H2LECUG9Y "

Details and order link for each package can be found below.

Amsterdam:  https://clients.mrvm.net/cart.php?gid=1
Phoenix: https://clients.mrvm.net/cart.php?gid=18


Please enjoy!
